meta.title: We Create Web Services for Millions
meta.description: Our specialty is front-end web development outsourcing. We bring logic to the world with JavaScript. And dream of the stars.

greeting.title:
Custom eCommerce
Development Services
greeting.paragraph: In the constantly growing and highly competitive industry of eCommerce every page, every metric, and every user’s opinion plays a huge role. We’re ready to transform your design layouts into well performing web site, that will boost your sales.

facts.heading: Development With a Personal Approach
facts.subHeading: Regardless of the size and duration of your project, you will get a personalized service and flexible conditions.

coreValues.heading: Core Values
coreValues.subHeading: We follow the highest standards of web development and apply best practices for each project

firstItem.text: Did you know that up to 20% of all users have special needs when using the Internet? A web application should not only be well written, so that only developers can appreciate it, but first of all, should be well delivered, so that every user can enjoy it on every level. We care. You can be sure that everybody will have an equal access to your product.

secondItem.text: Web applications should not only be well written, reliable, user-friendly but also business secure. We understand that a small vulnerability in an application can lead to significant financial and reputational risks. One incorrectly implemented authorization or payment form can lead to hacking and extraction of user or company data. From the very beginning, we think very carefully about the code architecture and pay special attention to this issue, even if there is a security audit on the client side.

thirdItem.text: We understand how important little things in design are, and we can do pixel-perfect development. But we never forget about user-friendliness. Developing your designs we are basically the first users of your product and we pay a lot of attention to the UX details that can seriously affect the users’ opinion. Perfectionism must be smart.
